                                                                                                                                                                                            # path.parse

                                                                                                                                                                                            å°†è·¯å¾„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è§£ææˆä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«è·¯å¾„ä¿¡æ¯çš„å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

  root: '/',           æ ¹ç›®å½•
  dir: '/app/src',     æ–‡ä»¶æ‰€åœ¨ç›®å½•
  base: 'index.html',  æ–‡ä»¶å.åç¼€å
  ext: '.html',        åç¼€å
  name: 'index'        æ–‡ä»¶å
*/

                                                                                                                                                                                            # path.format

                                                                                                                                                                                            å°†ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«è·¯å¾„ä¿¡æ¯çš„å¯¹è±¡è§£ææˆè·¯å¾„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚ä¸ path.parse() ç›¸åã€‚

  root: "/",
  dir: "/app/src",
  base: "index.html",
  ext: ".html",
  name: "index"
})
// '/app/src/index.html'

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.readFile

                                                                                                                                                                                            è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                            const { readFile } = require("node:fs")
const { readFileSync } = require("node:fs")

// å¼‚æ­¥è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶ callback
readFile("./file.txt", {
  encoding: "utf-8"
}, (error, data) => {
  // ...
})

// å¼‚æ­¥è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶ Promise
readFile("./file.txt", {
  encoding: "utf-8"
}).then(data => {
  // ...
})

// å¼‚æ­¥è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶ async / await
;(async () => {
  const data = await readFile("./file.txt", {
    encoding: "utf-8"
  })
})()

// åŒæ­¥è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶
const data = readFileSync("./file.txt", {
  encoding: "utf-8"
})

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.createReadStream

                                                                                                                                                                                            åˆ›å»ºå¯è¯»æµï¼ˆåˆ†æ®µï¼‰è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚ç”¨äºå¤„ç†å¤§æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                            const { createReadStream } = require("node:fs")

const readStream = createReadStream("./file.txt")

// æ­£åœ¨è¯»å–æ—¶è§¦å‘
readStream.on("data", chunk => {
  // ...
})

// è¯»å–å®Œæˆæ—¶è§¦å‘
readStream.on("end", () => {
  // ...
})

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.writeFile

                                                                                                                                                                                            å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¼šæ›¿æ¢åŸæœ‰çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚

const { writeFileSync } = require("node:fs")

// å¼‚æ­¥å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶
writeFile("./file.txt", "hello world")

// åŒæ­¥å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶
writeFileSync("./file.txt", "hello world", {
  flag: "a" /* append è¿½åŠ å†…å®¹ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯æ›¿æ¢ */
})

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.appendFile

                                                                                                                                                                                            å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¼šå‘æ–‡ä»¶è¿½åŠ å†…å®¹ã€‚è‹¥æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ›å»ºè¯¥æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.createWriteStream

                                                                                                                                                                                            åˆ›å»ºå¯å†™æµï¼ˆåˆ†æ®µï¼‰å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚ç”¨äºå¤„ç†å¤§æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

writeStream.write(/* data */)

// å†™å…¥å®Œæˆæ—¶è§¦å‘
writeStream.on("finish", () => {
  // ...
})

// å†™å…¥å¤±è´¥æ—¶è§¦å‘

  // ...
})

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.copyFile

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.rm

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.rename

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.stat

                                                                                                                                                                                            # fs.exists

                                                                                                                                                                                            # emitter.off

                                                                                                                                                                                            ç§»é™¤äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                            const EventEmitter = require("node:events")
const emitter = new EventEmitter()

const listenerA = () => {}
const listenerB = () => {}

emitter.on("myEvent", listenerA)
emitter.on("myEvent", listenerB)

emitter.off("myEvent", listenerB) // myEvent [listenerA]

                                                                                                                                                                                            # emitter.listeners

const listenerB = () => {}

emitter.on("myEvent", listenerB)

emitter.listeners("myEvent") // myEvent [listenerA, listenerB]

                                                                                                                                                                                            # emitter.listenerCount

emitter.on("myEvent", () => {})

                                                                                                                                                                                            æŒä¹…æ€§ Cookieï¼šä½¿ç”¨ expires è®¾ç½®è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼Œä¸æ¨èã€‚

// æœåŠ¡å™¨

  res.cookie("username", "admin", { expires: new Date(2023, 11, 31) })
})

                                                                                                                                                                                            # è·å– Cookie

                                                                                                                                                                                            å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼šé€šè¿‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å’Œæ•°ç»„æ–¹æ³•å°† document.cookie è§£ææˆå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

const cookies = document.cookie.split(";").reduce((prev, cookie) => {
  const [key, value] = cookie.trim().split("=")
  return {
    ...prev,
    [key]: value
  }
}, {})

// æœåŠ¡å™¨
app.get("/get-cookie", (req, res) => {
  req.cookies
})

                                                                                                                                                                                            # é…ç½® Session

                                                                                                                                                                                            • nameï¼šä»¥ Session ID å‘½åçš„ Cookie, é»˜è®¤å€¼ä¸º "connect.sid"

    name: "uuu",

                                                                                                                                                                                            # JWT

                                                                                                                                                                                            åŠ å¯†ï¼šjwt.sign(payload, secretOrPrivateKey, [options, callback])

  expiresIn: "1h"
})

// è§£å¯†

  }

                                                                                                                                                                                            # æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œ

                                                                                                                                                                                              åŒ¹é…ä¸€æ¡ç¬¦åˆ "age = 30" çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå°†å…¶ "retire" å­—æ®µçš„å€¼æ›´æ”¹ä¸º 0

                                                                                                                                                                                              æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¬¦åˆ "age > 20" çš„æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                            # ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

                                                                                                                                                                                            const mongoose = require("mongoose")

/* è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“ */
mongoose.connect("mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/easydb")

/* åˆ›å»ºéª¨æ¶ */
const schema = mongoose.Schema({
  name: String,
  age: Number
})

/* åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡å‹ */
const model = mongoose.model("users" /* ! 's' */, schema)

/* æ·»åŠ æ•°æ® */
model.create({ name: "Even", age: 35 }) // ä½¿ç”¨ mongoose æ·»åŠ çš„æ•°æ®éƒ½ä¼šæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª "__v" å­—æ®µ

/* åˆ é™¤æ•°æ® */
model.deleteMany({ age: 35 })

/* æ›´æ–°æ•°æ® */
model.updateMany({ age: 35 }, { $set: { retire: 0 } })

/* æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ® */
model.find({ age: { $gt: 20 } }, { name: 1, age: 1, _id: 0 })
